alert.note: Alert for McCook; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 29 at 2:40AM MDT until May 29 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MINNEHAHA...NORTHWESTERN LINCOLN...SOUTHEASTERN MCCOOK...NORTHEASTERN YANKTON AND CENTRAL TURNER COUNTIES... At 339 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wall Lake, or 8 miles northeast of Parker, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Wall Lake around 345 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hartford, Ellis, Sioux Falls and Crooks. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
